email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. Laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Would you consider $50.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your prompt response. I can offer $51.25 per ton, which is a fair rate given the current market. Demurrage is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 per ton is acceptable. However, could we agree on a demurrage rate of $18,000 per day? Also, please confirm the laytime start and end dates. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $18,000 per day for demurrage. Laytime will start on 15 October and end on 20 October. Please confirm if we can proceed with these terms. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let's proceed with the terms: $51.25 per ton, demurrage at $18,000 per day, and laytime 15-20 October. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I'll prepare the contract and send it over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah
